extendedInfo.description: If you are Kelly Clarkson's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Kelly Clarkson's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Kelly Clarkson's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Kelly Clarkson's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page. Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :) -------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics -------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Thankful- Breakaway- My December- All I Ever Wanted- Stronger-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - (You Make Me Feel Like) A Natural Woman- A Moment Like This- A Moment Like This (Single Version)- Addicted- After The Love- All I Ever Wanted- All I Know- Me- Breakaway- Breaking Your Own Heart- Call Me- Can I Have A Kiss- Can We Go Back- Catch My Breath- Chivas- Cleopatra- Close Your Eyes- Come Here- Cry- Dance- Dark Side- Did You- Dirty Little Secret- Don't- Don't Be A Girl About It- Don't Ever Give Up On Me- Don't Let Me Stop You- Don't Rush- Don't Waste Your Time- Don't You Wanna Stay- Dumb + Dumb = U- Einstein- Empty Handed- Fading- Get Up (A reviews.title: pleased
reviews.comment: i love kelly clarkson and i love this app. i love having lyrics at the palm of my hands and this is great. the only problem with this is that it isnt stored on my sd card
reviews.author: Chels Underwood

reviews.title: Marvellous
reviews.comment: What a lyrics!my heart will melt when I listen this lyrics,First I dont know that who is kelly clarkson and now I m his best fan.
reviews.author: Ali Asgar Moti

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It\'s got all of my all-time favorite songs! And it doesn\'t take a lot of memory space. :)
reviews.author: Cassela Mendoza
